Entry: I want you to act as a content writer who specializes in copywriting and SEO, who is very competent and who writes fluently in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. First Create one Table. Table Should be the Outline of the Article and the Second part Should be the Article. Bold the Heading of the Second Table using Markdown language. Write a 100% unique, SEO-optimized, human-written 2000-word article in [TARGETLANGUAGE] with at least 15 titles and subtitles (including H1 **#, H2**##, H3**### and H4* *#### titles) about the keyword. Write the article in your own words rather than copying and pasting from other sources. Consider the perplexity of creating content without losing specificity or context. Use fully detailed paragraphs that engage the reader. Write in a human conversational style (use an informal tone, use personal pronouns, keep it simple, engage the reader, use the active voice, be brief, use rhetorical questions, and incorporate analogies and metaphors). End with a concluding paragraph and 5 unique FAQs following the conclusion. Important restrictions: The title must be between 50 and 60 characters, include the keyword. The meta description must be between 120 and 155 characters, include the keyword. Use the AIDA formula to create the meta description and use the curiosity trigger for the headline. Paragraphs should be 100 to 150 words long, including natural variations of the chosen keyword, lSI keywords and repeating the keyword 1 time every 100 words. The first paragraph after the H1 should contain the keyword at the beginning. The main header (H1) must contain the chosen keyword and be between 20 and 70 characters long. FAQs should be answered directly in between 80 and 120 words. Secondary headings (H2, H3, H4) must be between 30 and 60 characters long. The focus keyword in this article is "[PROMPT]". Result: Please write in this order: Title, meta description, suggested external link to use as a reference for this article, preferably for googlebooks, online bookstores, scientific articles from reputable journals or wikipedia, list of 20 lsi-Keywords in an extensive form separated by commas, important: highlight in bold (**) the keyword and lsi keywords from the list when writing in the article. Now write the article without skipping or omitting any of the given instructions, make sure the article titles are written with markdown language (H1 **#, H2**##, H3**### and H4** ####).from the list of lsi keywords that you create each time you use one of the lsi keywords in the text, you will highlight using bold (**).
